span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 组成，包含：to constitute or include
【例】 a plan that encompasses multiple aims
【近】 contain, comprehend, embody, entail, involve, subsume
【反】 exclude 排除
【考法 2】 v. 包围： envelop
【例】 Berlin had already been encompassed by the Red Army
【近】 circle, embrace, enclose, environ, surround
【记】 en + compass(罗盘、范围)→进入范围→包围
